pkgmetadata.longdescription: ============================Django IPG HRMS employee============================Quick start============1. Add 'employee' to your INSTALLED_APPS settings like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'employee' ]2. Include the employee to project URLS like this:: path('employee/', include('employee.urls')),3. Run ``python manage.py migrate`` to create employee model4. Another Apps Need for this Apps:: 4.1. custom:: 4.2. employee:: 4.3. user
